aboutMe.name: My name is Moisés Mannarino, and I graduated as a Higher Technician in Systems Analysis from the Virasoro Institute of Higher Informatics.
aboutMe.specialization: I specialize in the MEAN stack and believe I have a strong overall level of JavaScript. I am also proficient in the Angular framework on the frontend and Node.js with Express.js on the backend, along with MongoDB as the database.
aboutMe.skills: I also have expertise in web design, web animations, and can build a complete application from frontend to backend, including communication between the different parts, logic, and software structure.
aboutMe.languages: I also have advanced written English skills, allowing me to read books, articles, and tutorials in English. I can engage in real-time written conversations in English through chat, although I am not fluent in spoken English.
aboutMe.otherTechnologies: In the past, I have also studied, taken courses, and worked with other technologies such as PHP, MySQL, React.js, Vue.js, WordPress, and more.
aboutMe.quote: I only know one way to do things: do them well!

studies.psychology: Bachelor's degree in Psychology from the Catholic University of Santa Fe, 44 subjects passed.
